products.title: Loras Blackout Sonnet Roller Blind
products.description: Country life is beautifully depicted in this printed fabric roller blind, with softly sketched singing birds, green stems and delicate white blooms that meander over a pretty sage green backdrop. The loras sonnet blackout roller blind brings you the beauty of nature, whilst the effective blackout fabric keeps your interior shaded and peaceful until youre ready to let the outside in. Product id: sdb-rbx1952 fabric colour: sonnet material: 100% polyester lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes loras blackout sonnet roller blind in blue/green/multicoloured.

products.title: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Loras blackout melody grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches its a serene design that will gain many compliments. This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Bloom Pvc Blackout Amelie Roller Blind
products.description: A range of eye-catching florals made from a pvc fabric - perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. This multicoloured floral roller blind is the perfect addition to your home. The pvc fabric is easy to clean and perfect for areas where it will be exposed to damp such as your bathroom. products.title: Quackers Pvc Blackout Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Instantly add something fun and quirky with quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant and flame retardant fabric so is ideal for kids rooms or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. products.title: Whitby Pvc Blackout Navy Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space. The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

products.title: Whitby Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, whitby blackout pvc stone grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean. products.title: Abstract Hearts - Roller Blind
products.description: We love abstract hearts, and we hope you do too. If you're looking to add some charm and individuality to your chosen space, there's nothing better than a classic design that's been reinvented with an abstract twist. Just what you need when you want to see something different every time you look at your new blinds. If you want to really take your decor to new heights, keep your decor minimal, your walls neutral, and create a theme by adding some matching wall art.

products.title: Hearts Dess - Roller Blind
products.description: When you're feeling a little blue, there's nothing better than creating decor that makes you feel like you're getting a great big hug the moment you walk in the door. That's what we've tried to achieve with hearts dess, and we think you're going to love the gentle off-white and calming blues we've used. If you want to extend the theme around the room, how about adding some faded pinks and greens to the mix? That way you can enjoy plenty of colour contrasts, but not in a way that overwhelms your chosen space.

products.title: Smiling Clouds Candy - Roller Blind
products.description: Smiling clouds candy is a roller blind that will melt your heart the very first time you see it. The gentle contrast between the soft white and the faded pink allows the design to sit elegantly in the background, adding depth and character along the way. Matching to this stunning valentine's-inspired design is all about being soft with the pastel colours. A faded sky blue is a great option for your walls, and if you're feeling adventurous you might even want to think about a washed out mint green.

products.title: Tribe, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: Tribe coral combines an electric blue, calming coral, and a classic geometric pattern to create a design that no one should be without. The first time you see it you'll be amazed at how easy it's been to find the missing piece of your decor puzzle. Matching your scatter cushions and lampshades to the electric blue is a great way to build a theme in the master bedroom that won't overwhelm your existing decor.

products.title: Valentine - Roller Blind
products.description: Valentine is the design you've been waiting for if you want to make your house a home in a just a couple of minutes. The black and white lines ebb and flow to give the design a lovely sketched quality. Just what you need when you want the loved up red to really come to life. Bring your bedroom right up to date by adding valentine this weekend. It's a strikingly simple design, and that's why it can be the focal point that you've been searching for.

products.title: Fuji Silk Samurai Steel Roller Blind
products.description: The fuji silk samurai steel roller blind is a great alternative to a traditional grey roller blind while achieving the same aesthetic, with its shot-silk effect giving the blind a more silver metallic feel, this blind is a great way to add some texture to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind has a beautiful shot-silk effec running across the fabric - perfect for adding some textured style to your window.

products.title: Fuji Silk Snow Roller Blind
products.description: The fuji silk snow roller blind will blend seamlessly into your interior with its gentle neutral cream colour, while also adding a gorgeous texture to your window with its silky fabric. This blind is very versatile and can be paired in many different ways to create a modern, sophisticated interior. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: This gorgeous emerald green roller blind will really enhance your home, this blind will add some colour and personality to whichever room you put it in and become the focal point with its silk-like texture, this blind will bring a luxurious feel to your window. This blind has a beautiful shot-silk effec running across the fabric - perfect for adding some textured style to your window.

products.title: Fuji Silk Zen Sand Roller Blind
products.description: If youre after an alternative to a more neutral coloured roller blind, then the fuji silk zen sand roller blind is a brilliant option, with its luxury silky texture and golden sandy color, this blind will enhance your window and add an aura of sophistication to your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: The subtle brown tones of the fuji silk mocha roller blind will add some warmth to your home.
